description:
(i) No abstraction shall begin unless the Licence Holder has installed data loggers in <<borehole/s description>> at <<NGR(s)>> marked on the <<site map/map>> so as to measure and record water levels to an accuracy of <<measurement e.g. 0.02 metres>> at a frequency of at least every <<duration>>.

(ii) The Licence Holder shall ensure that the date loggers (i) are capable of measuring and recording water levels accurately to a minimum of <<measurement e.g. 0.02 metres>>.

(iii) The Licence Holder shall ensure that the data loggers measure and record water levels at a frequency of at least <<duration>>.

(iv) The Licence Holder shall maintain the data loggers in accordance with the manufacturerâ€™s instructions (and replace if necessary) to ensure that they remain in good working order.
